name: Parsley and Romaine Salad
instructions: Take up a handful of the parsley and bunch it together, then slice into thin strips (chiffonade) by cutting across the bunch with a chefâ€™s knife. Repeat until all of the parsley is cut into chiffonade. Transfer to a salad bowl.
Stack the romaine leaves and cut crosswise into chiffonade. Add to the salad bowl. Add the pine nuts, baguette croutons and chives.
Just before serving, toss with the dressing.
